title: Beetroot chocolate cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '250g uncooked beetroot', '275g plain chocolate, chopped', '100ml sunflower oil', '200g golden caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 large eggs', '110g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '55g ground almonds', 'For the buttercream icing', '85g butter', '175g icing sugar', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '1 tablespoon full fat milk']
